bad: Upstream: Could not find version on github

about.description:
CppUTest is a C /C++ based unit xUnit test framework for unit testing
and for test-driving your code. It is written in C++ but is used in C
and C++ projects and frequently used in embedded systems but it works
for any C/C++ project.
about.summary: Unit testing and mocking framework for C/C++

name: cpputest

new_version_errors.4.0:
The recipe did not change in the version migration, a URL did not hash, or there is jinja2 syntax the bot cannot handle!

Please check the URLs in your recipe with version '4.0' to make sure they exist!

We also found the following errors:

 - could not hash URL template 'https://github.com/cpputest/cpputest/releases/download/v{{ version }}/cpputest-{{ version }}.tar.gz'

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "cpputest" %}
{% set version = "4.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/cpputest/cpputest/releases/download/v{{ version }}/cpputest-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 81c4958a3ec20ebe87b2cb658c334d27496c715972ddb71262357f449a7c1df3

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [not linux]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - make

test:
  files:
    - test/
  requires:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - make

about:
  home: https://github.com/cpputest/cpputest
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: COPYING.txt
  summary: Unit testing and mocking framework for C/C++

  description: |
    CppUTest is a C /C++ based unit xUnit test framework for unit testing
    and for test-driving your code. It is written in C++ but is used in C
    and C++ projects and frequently used in embedded systems but it works
    for any C/C++ project.
  doc_url: http://cpputest.github.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/cpputest/cpputest/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - avrahamshukron
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
